snippet: President Obama announces new sanctions on Russian officials. Also on the Minute, a push for peace in the Middle East and the looming enrollment deadline for the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: President Obama announces new sanctions on Russian officials. Also on the Minute, a push for peace in the Middle East and the looming enrollment deadline for the Affordable Care Act.

headline.main: Times Minute | New Sanctions for Russia
headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
